item.title: 特斯拉长期股东 Baillie Gifford 支持马斯克支付 560 亿美元薪酬
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司最长期的股东之一、苏格兰资产管理公司 Baillie Gifford 将对埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案投赞成票。【原文：One of Tesla Inc.’s longest-standing holders, Scottish asset manager Baillie Gifford, will vote in favor of Elon Musk’s $56 billion pay package, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 主要能源投资者称，除非钻机数量增加，否则明年美国石油产量将下降
item.description: 一位重要的能源投资者表示，除非钻机数量增加，否则到2025年下半年，美国的石油日产量将下降约100万桶。【原文：US oil production is set to decline about 1 million barrels per day by the second half of 2025 unless rig counts rise, a key energy investor said.】

item.title: Glencore 取代 Trafigura 成为英国重要炼油厂的供应商
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc.【原文：Commodity trader Glencore Plc. will replace its rival Trafigura Group as the supplier of crude oil to a key refinery in the UK.】

item.title: Textainer 正在洽谈以 50 亿美元收购海航旗下 Seaco 公司的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stonepeak 旗下的 Textainer 正在就从倒闭的中国企业集团海航集团旗下的一家公司收购集装箱租赁公司 Seaco 进行深入谈判。【原文：Stonepeak-owned Textainer is in advanced talks to acquire container leasing firm Seaco from an arm of failed Chinese conglomerate HNA Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行降息不会使利率进入 "直线下降通道
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行必须保持谨慎，上周下调借贷成本后不一定会有进一步的快速举措。【原文：The European Central Bank must stay cautious, and last week’s cut in borrowing costs won’t necessarily be followed by further rapid moves, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 以太投资产品迎来 3 月以来最大单周流入量
item.description: 根据 CoinShares International Ltd. 的数据，美国证券交易委员会允许以太币交易所交易基金的意外决定可能导致持有第二大加密货币的投资产品创下数月来最大单周流入量。【原文：A surprise decision from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to allow Ether exchange-traded funds likely led to the largest weekly inflows in months into investment products holding the second-largest cryptocurrency, according to CoinShares International Ltd.】

item.title: 支付公司敦促英国监管机构推迟制定欺诈退款规则
item.description: 英国支付行业要求再用一年时间为强制企业偿还诈骗受害者的新规定做好准备，并称本月初最高监管机构的辞职是一个 "重新设定的机会"。【原文：The UK payments industry has asked for another year to get ready for new rules forcing firms to reimburse scam victims, saying the resignation of the top regulator earlier this month was an “opportunity to re-set.”】

item.title: 勒庞 28 岁的政治继承人面临生死攸关的时刻
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统决定举行临时大选，这使法国陷入了不确定性之中；但事实证明，这可能会造就乔丹-巴尔德拉（Jordan Bardella）--玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）28 岁的爱好自拍的政治继承人。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron’s decision to call a snap election has plunged France into uncertainty — but it may prove to be the making of Jordan Bardella, Marine Le Pen’s 28-year-old selfie-loving political heir.】

item.title: 纽约市交通拥堵定价延迟使交通局信用评级面临风险
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司称，大都会运输局票箱收入债券的信用评级可能会因纽约市交通拥堵收费计划的推迟而受到影响。【原文：The credit rating on the Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s farebox revenue bonds could be hurt by the delay of New York City’s congestion pricing plan, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 芝加哥考虑举债 40 亿美元升级奥黑尔机场
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）本周正在寻求批准发行数十亿美元的债券，用于奥黑尔国际机场的现代化改造以及将两栋办公楼改建为经济适用房。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is seeking approval this week to issue several billion dollars in bonds to modernize O’Hare International Airport as well as convert two office buildings into affordable apartments.】

item.title: 波兰有望因赤字问题面临欧盟侵权程序
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）预计，波兰将因去年赤字过高而面临欧盟的处理程序。【原文：Poland’s Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski expects the country will face the European Union’s procedure for its excessive deficit last year.】

item.title: 纽约联储称消费者对股票的乐观情绪创三年新高
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，美国家庭对股市前景的乐观程度为三年来最高。【原文：American households are the most optimistic about prospects for the stock market in three years, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey.】

item.title: 石油交易商贡渥集团抢购其他公司正在卸载的基准原油
item.description: 贡渥集团是最大的独立石油贸易商之一，它正在抢购其他公司正在卸载的基准原油货物，这可能表明该公司看涨原油。【原文：Gunvor Group, one of the biggest independent oil traders, is snapping up benchmark-defining cargoes of crude oil that other companies are offloading, a possible indication of the firm being bullish.】

item.title: 阿根廷债券和比索暴跌，华尔街接受现实检验
item.description: 由于立法者对哈维尔-米莱伊总统旨在将这个连续拖欠债务的国家拖出日益加深的经济危机的一揽子亲市场改革方案进行反击，阿根廷的资产正在下滑。【原文：Argentine assets are sliding as lawmakers kick back against President Javier Milei’s package of pro-market reforms designed to drag the serial-defaulter out of its deepening economic crisis.】

item.title: 印度石油部长哈迪普-普里再次被任命为莫迪新内阁成员
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）任命哈迪普-普里（Hardeep Puri）连任石油部长，彰显了他认为曾任外交官的哈迪普-普里最适合管理与沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯和美国等供应国的关系。【原文：India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi appointed Hardeep Puri oil minister for a second consecutive term, underlining the belief that a former diplomat is best suited to manage ties with suppliers including Saudi Arabia, Russia, and the US.】

item.description: 在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的新一届联合政府中，尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）再次被任命为印度财政部长，为世界上增长最快的经济体之一提供了政策连续性。【原文：Nirmala Sitharaman was reappointed India’s finance minister in Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new coalition government, providing policy continuity in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.】

item.title: 巴克莱警告国债改革将阻碍系统性交易
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，一项全面的监管改革将重新安排美国国债交易的清算方式，这可能会阻碍主权债券电子交易策略的发展。【原文：A sweeping regulatory change that’s set to rewire the way US Treasury trades clear will likely stunt advancements in sovereign bond electronic trading strategies, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: United Talent Agency 与 Roof 签订协议，进军欧洲足球市场
item.description: 为收购一家足球经纪公司，United Talent Agency 寻找了三年多的时间，终于收购了杰出足球运动员代表公司（Representatives of Outstanding Footballers），希望借此进军足球运动。【原文：After searching for more than three years to purchase a football agency, United Talent Agency has acquired Representatives of Outstanding Footballers in its bid to expand into the sport.】

item.title: 铜价接近创纪录也无法阻止一家矿商破产
item.description: 内华达铜业公司（Nevada Copper Corp.）是一家由帕拉投资公司（Pala Investments）和Mercuria能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）支持的矿商，该公司已申请破产保护，尽管金属价格已接近历史最高水平。【原文：Nevada Copper Corp., a miner backed by Pala Investments and Mercuria Energy Group Ltd., has filed for bankruptcy protection, even as prices of the metal sit near the highest on record.】

item.title: 呼吸机制造商 Vyaire 因 Covid-19 需求减少而破产
item.description: 随着Covid-19大流行病的缓解，呼吸机需求下降，呼吸机制造商Vyaire医疗公司申请破产。【原文：Ventilator-maker Vyaire Medical Inc. filed for bankruptcy, succumbing to a decline in demand for ventilators as the Covid-19 pandemic has eased.】

item.title: 意大利汽车供应商 PSC 与银行谈判解决债务问题
item.description: 意大利汽车供应商 Prima Sole Components SpA 及其银行贷款人正在商谈如何解决公司的债务结构问题。【原文：Italian auto supplier Prima Sole Components SpA and its bank lenders are in talks about how to address the company’s debt structure.】

item.title: Trafigura 交割后，LME 铝排队时间跃升至五个月
item.description: 今年 5 月，特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）交付了大量金属，伦敦金属交易所的铝交割等待时间从零延长到五个多月。【原文：The wait to take delivery of aluminum on the London Metal Exchange went from zero to more than five months after a massive delivery of metal from Trafigura Group in May.】

item.title: 跟踪 CLO 的 Janus ETF 在零和竞赛中达到 100 亿美元
item.description: 追踪抵押贷款债务的最大 ETF 资产已达 100 亿美元，帮助 Janus Henderson 进一步加强了对这一快速增长的利基市场的控制。【原文：The biggest ETF tracking collateralized loan obligations has reached $10 billion in assets, helping Janus Henderson further tighten its grip on the quickly growing niche.】

item.title: 罗布斯塔咖啡因供应担忧而波动剧烈
item.description: 罗布斯塔咖啡在伦敦的波动幅度低于近期高点，原因是对全球供应的担忧使波动幅度持续上升。【原文：Robusta coffee fluctuated below a recent high in London, as worries over global supplies keep volatility elevated.】

item.title: 诺贝尔公司将以 16 亿美元收购竞争对手 Diamond Offshore 钻井公司
